hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive

Class DefaultRunnable

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.DefaultRunnable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public abstract class DefaultRunnable
extends Object
implements Runnable
    A default runnable implementation which may use an internal or external lock to synchronize access to its alternative onRun method. FIXME might need an option to share a completed flag?!
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.02.06.

      • cancelled

        public boolean cancelled()
        Returns:
        returns the current thread's interrupted state, which indicate a cancel request from an outside source.

      • cancel

        protected void cancel()
        An internal cancel method which ensures that if this runnable is within a periodic schedule, it won't execute the next time.

        Note that this method throws a CancellationException which, when propagated back to the scheduler pool, will disable the wrapper task. Therefore, ensure that you do not accidentally catch this exception by a catch (Throwable ex) clause.

      • onRun

        protected abstract void onRun()
        The alternative run method, which will be called by the original run() method under lock.
